channel.title: Comments on: How To Create PayPal Account That Can Send And Receive Fund In Nigeria

item.title: By: Hardeywarlex
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/paypal-account/#comment-2275">Olamilekan</a>.
This is a general issue now with PayPal, Nigeria ip restricted
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Olamilekan.

This is a general issue now with PayPal, Nigeria ip restricted

item.title: By: Olamilekan
item.dc:creator: Olamilekan
item.description: I follow all these steps and I created business PayPal account but my account was later banned,pls what can I do
item.content:encoded: I follow all these steps and I created business PayPal account but my account was later banned,pls what can I do

item.title: By: Hardeywarlex
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/paypal-account/#comment-1658">Anonymous</a>.
Just open another account following the procedure on this article
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Anonymous.

Just open another account following the procedure on this article

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: Please I have already created a personal pay pal account because I had no idea before coming across this post, how do I make amendments to suit these steps?
item.content:encoded: Please I have already created a personal pay pal account because I had no idea before coming across this post, how do I make amendments to suit these steps?

item.title: By: Hardeywarlex
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/paypal-account/#comment-1422">Anonymous</a>.
No, u need a prepaid card. Africard recommended
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Anonymous.

No, u need a prepaid card. Africard recommended

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: Can we connect Nigeria master card to the PayPal account instead of That africard?
item.content:encoded: Can we connect Nigeria master card to the PayPal account instead of That africard?

item.title: By: Hardeywarlex
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/paypal-account/#comment-1248">Amarachi</a>.
Next time, send money using friends and family option. Tell him/her to check his/her mail to accept payment
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Amarachi.

Next time, send money using friends and family option. Tell him/her to check his/her mail to accept payment

item.title: By: Amarachi
item.dc:creator: Amarachi
item.description: I opened the business paypal and l have $500 is my wallet now. I tried sending 50$ to my fried in USA to send back to me as Dollars. They removed the money from paypal but he didn't recieve it. It keeps saying they are waiting for him to accept the payment in my paypal But he hasn't seen an email or the money in his paypal
item.content:encoded: I opened the business paypal and l have $500 is my wallet now. I tried sending 50$ to my fried in USA to send back to me as Dollars. They removed the money from paypal but he didn’t recieve it. It keeps saying they are waiting for him to accept the payment in my paypal But he hasn’t seen an email or the money in his paypal

item.title: By: Freebiestech
item.dc:creator: Freebiestech
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/paypal-account/#comment-1114">Zakariyyah</a>.
Yes, with the email you used to create the account.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Zakariyyah.

Yes, with the email you used to create the account.

item.title: By: Zakariyyah
item.dc:creator: Zakariyyah
item.description: Thanks for the Info. Pls after creating a Lesotho paypal account, can i login that account on Paypal app?
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the Info. Pls after creating a Lesotho paypal account, can i login that account on Paypal app?
